articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The U.S. Space Force put a stop to personal AI use on duty, joining companies wary of generative AI's implications on privacy and security.
articles.title: AI Sparks Security Fears at US Space Force

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Launched in beta, Uniswap's wallet offers automatic switching between mainnet and layer-2 networks, along with other features.
articles.title: Uniswap Launches Mobile Ethereum Wallet on Android

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Someone has created a mod that adds Thomas the Tank Engine to Skyrim creator Bethesda's latest game, Starfield. Now you can't unsee his face.
articles.title: You Can Now Add Thomas the Tank Engine to Starfield—Yes, Really

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: A new bipartisan bill proposed Thursday would create a new federal law forbidding the creation of AI-generated mimics of a person without their consent.
articles.title: Senators Want to Ban AI Copycats Like Fake Drake and The Weeknd Song

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried faces seven criminal charges related to the dramatic collapse of his crypto empire. Here's the latest on his trial.
articles.title: SBF Trial Live Updates: Did Alameda 'YOLO' FTX Customer Funds?

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: While the gaming industry continues to be plagued by mass layoffs, crypto gaming is still seeing many millions invested each quarter.
articles.title: Crypto Gaming Attracted $600M Worth of Q3 Investment Despite Bear Market

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Many funds stolen from the bankrupt exchange have been combined with those of Russian criminals.
articles.title: There's Now a 'Stronger Possibility' Russian Actors Involved in $477 Million FTX Hack

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Politicians in Argentina point fingers at AI for leaked audio used to allege a former central bank president of sexual harassment.
articles.title: Melcogate: AI Blamed for Leaked Audio That Sparked Argentina Political Drama

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: BRICKs are booming, as Reddit’s Fortnite-inspired crypto token sees a substantial pop—and Reddit’s MOON token rose too.
articles.title: Fortnite Reddit Reward Token BRICK Surges 131%—Why?

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The government agencies say the company lied about how "safe" their customers' assets really were.
articles.title: Ex-Voyager CEO Sued By CFTC and FTC for Misleading Customers

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The asset was mentioned again during Bankman-Fried's trial. It's now down significantly compared to last week.
articles.title: FTX Favorite Solana Dips After Frequent Mentions in Sam Bankman-Fried's Trial

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: UPDATE: The Modern Warfare III beta has extended from PlayStation to Xbox and PC as well. Here's how to get into Early Access today.
articles.title: You Can Play 'Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III' Now—Here's How

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: This is the first time a commodities trading advisor has been charged with a operating a fraudulent crypto trading scheme.
articles.title: CEO Pleads Guilty to Crypto Futures Cherry-Picking Scheme

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The NBA stars and their family have signed a deal to appear in the upcoming battle royale shooter StrayShot, which uses the SKALE blockchain.
articles.title: NBA's LaMelo and Lonzo Ball—And Their Dad—Star in NFT Game 'StrayShot'

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The revised submission from Ark now includes risks of a change to Bitcoin’s code as well as how its custodian will handle assets.
articles.title: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Refiles Bitcoin ETF Application—Here's What's New

articles.description: AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie discuss the challenges that come with building on Ethereum, ETH sidechains, and layer-two blockchains.
articles.title: Why AI Arena is Building on Arbitrum

articles.author: Alyssa Hertig
articles.description: A new Bitcoin proposal says anything can be computed on the network, but devs are split on whether that's a good idea.
articles.title: Compute Anything on Bitcoin? What You Need to Know About BitVM

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Blackdot created an automatic tattoo device that can ink images and artwork on the human body with little pain and complete accuracy. Artists like Tyler Hobbs are already jumping aboard.
articles.title: Automated Ink: This Machine Could Upend the Tattoo Industry

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: U.S. consumer prices increased in September, though underlying inflation is cooling—what does this mean for Bitcoin?
articles.title: Bitcoin Dips With Rest of Market as U.S. Inflation Holds at 3.7%

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: “Crypto projects just aren’t announcing their rounds,” one VC told Decrypt, which has fueled the narrative that there's no more funding.
articles.title: Crypto VC Funding Is Way Down—But How Bad Is It?

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Account Labs' UniPass wallet is yet another step in the direction of making crypto wallets "smarter" using account abstraction.
articles.title: Account Labs Raises $7.7 Million for New Google-Enabled Crypto Wallet

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: UK parliamentary committee said the limited practical use of fan tokens underscores the financial dangers they pose to consumers.
articles.title: UK House of Commons Warns Against Soccer Clubs Using Fan Tokens

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: 20 validators malfunctioned yesterday meaning the leading liquid staker Lido Finance will face serious penalties in the coming weeks.
articles.title: Lido Finance Faces Slashing Penalty of More Than $30,000 in Ethereum

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: Scammers have created a fraudulent website purporting to offer a fake Decrypt "DCPT" token, putting user's funds at risk of a wallet attack.
articles.title: Scammers Are Impersonating Decrypt—Please Don't Fall for It

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: FTX’s sister trading firm Alameda Research prioritized speed at the expense of proper security practices, claims a former employee.
articles.title: Alameda Trader Phished for $100 Million After Clicking Malicious Google Link, Says Ex-Engineer

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Complementing its flagship Bitcoin hardware wallet, the Trezor Model T, the Czech-based manufacturer has unveiled a new line-up of products.
articles.title: Trezor Launches New Hardware Wallets, Metal Seed Backup for Crypto Beginners

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: In a text exchange between Ellison and Sam Bankman-Fried, she told him she was in her "best mood."
articles.title: ‘I Didn’t Have to Lie Anymore’—FTX Collapse Was a Relief, Says Caroline Ellison

articles.author: Stephanie Hirschmiller
articles.description: Beauty giant L’Oréal launched a new creative hub in Paris that includes an AI-powered tool for following—and perhaps creating—trends.
articles.title: L’Oréal's New Paris Hub Has an AI 'Visionary Wall'—Here's How it Works

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: USDR is backed by real estate, and is designed to generate yield for its holders.
articles.title: Yield Generating Stablecoin USDR Loses Peg, Plummets to $0.50

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Twitter is abuzz with examples of GPT-4's new visual abilities. Here are some of the best.
articles.title: From Reading X-Rays to Decoding Classified UFO Reports, ChatGPT Shows Off Its Vision

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The acquisition of Refik Anadol's work is part of a broader recent push at MoMA to embrace digital art and the blockchain in the long-term.
articles.title: Despite AI Pushback, MoMA Acquires First Generative AI Artwork

articles.description:
Welcome to the 4th episode of this time will be different.

Our guest for today's episode is Pet3rpan_ from Metacartel, 1kx, HydraVentures, and more!

https://twitter.com/pet3rpan_

This Time Will Be Different is sponsored by 1000x
https://decrypt.co/1000x
articles.title: Pet3rPan_ on venture DAOs and blockchain games

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: In her second day taking the stand, Bankman-Fried's ex-girlfriend spoke about an alleged scheme to reclaim frozen funds.
articles.title: FTX, Thai Prostitutes and Chinese Bribes: Caroline Ellison Drops Explosive Allegations

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Another closed ecosystem plans to limit how players can use "owned" assets, prompting backlash from Rocket League fans. Do NFTs point the way for gaming?
articles.title: Rocket League Players Revolt Over Item Trading Ban—Do NFTs Fix This?

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: With activity waning, Ethereum’s “ultrasound money” meme is under attack as supply is currently growing at an annual inflation of 0.44%.
articles.title: Ethereum Gas Fees Hit New Low for 2023 as DeFi, NFT Activity Drops

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: Lido Finance's $4 million ARB grant proposal on Snapshot has become a battleground over the project's purported centralization concerns.
articles.title: Lido's Arbitrum Proposal Splits Community Over Grant Size, Centralization Concerns

articles.author: Matt Hussey,Ki Chong Tran,Stephen Graves
articles.description: Every four years, the amount of Bitcoin awarded to miners is halved, an event known as the Bitcoin halving.
articles.title: What is the Bitcoin Halving? How Bitcoin's Supply is Limited.

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Per a Twitter thread draft, Bankman-Fried called Alameda Research “It was one of my largest successes–and then, briefly, largest failures."
articles.title: Twitter Thread Suggests Sam Bankman-Fried Mulled Shutting Alameda Months Before FTX Collapse

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The McRib is back and analysts are busy trying to pin Bitcoin and stock performances to the McDonald’s sandwich relaunch.
articles.title: Bored Bitcoin Analysts Point to McRib Meme for Bullish Return

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Crypto firm Immutable has joined Amazon Web Services' ISV Accelerate Program to develop blockchain gaming infrastructure solutions.
articles.title: Amazon and Immutable Want to Make it Easier to Launch Crypto Games

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Shrapnel's Head of Studio Don Norbury to get the latest updates on how the NFT-powered first-person sci-fi extraction shooter's development is progressing.
articles.title: Inside Shrapnel's Marketplace, New Map, and 'AI Director' Feature

articles.description: Art Blocks founder and CEO Erick Calderon sat down with Sander Lutz, lead culture reporter at Decrypt's SCENE, at Art Blocks Marfa Weekend 2023. They discuss the evolution of the company and the generative art world, along with what draws art enthusiasts to be an active part of the community.
articles.title: 'Art of the Times': Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon on the State of Generative Art

articles.description: One of the most powerful aspects of blockchain technology is its ability to provide us genuine ownership of our digital assets. This is called digital ownership. In this video, we’ll deep dive into digital ownership, why it matters, and how web3 makes owning digital assets like our social networks, music libraries, personal data, and beyond possible. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Writer at Consensys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: Digital Ownership Explained

articles.description: Reza Jafery and Martin Shkreli sit down for a casual conversation about the growing movement that is E/ACC, what songs they could recite at gunpoint, and whether or not SBF will thrive or just survive during his time in prison.
articles.title: Martin Shkreli on E/ACC and SBF in Prison

articles.description: AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie discuss how artificial intelligence can shape the video game experience.
articles.title: What Can AI Do in Gaming?

articles.description: Timmu Tõke, co-founder and CEO of Ready Player Me, joins Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin to discuss the startup's approach to powering avatars that are interoperable across games and metaverse platforms—and what's needed to convince the industry to adopt standards and open up.
articles.title: 'There Are No Real Standards': Ready Player Me CEO Timmu Tõke on Building for an Open Gaming Ecosystem

articles.description: Shrapnel Studio Head Don Norbury tells Kate Irwin the reasons why the upcoming first-person shooter game will offer a wide range of NFTs. He also reveals team-based gameplay plans and shares how game maps have already changed this year.
articles.title: Blockchain Is 'Only Way' Forward for Gaming, Says Shrapnel Studio Head

articles.description: Sacha Ghebali, Director of Strategy and Business Development at The TIE, says social media sentiment remains a key factor in price movements for major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum. However, he notes that sentiment has turned more negative lately amid regulatory uncertainty. Ghebali believes events like the Ripple lawsuit ruling significantly impacted sentiment and prices. André Beganski interviewed him at Messari Mainnet.
articles.title: Social Media Sentiment Is Key to Crypto Price Discovery

articles.author: Reza Jafery
articles.description: Our host Reza Jafery is joined by Gareth Fenney aka 500Altcoins. They discuss the glory days of DeFi Summer and whether or not its a smart move for builders in the crypto space to relocate to Dubai.
articles.title: 500Altcoins discusses DeFi Summer and the Dubai Crypto Scene - This Time Will Be Different - Episode 2

articles.description: David Gogel of dYdX discusses how the decentralized exchange is building a custom blockchain to fully decentralize derivatives trading. He explained how the new dYdX chain will allow validators to run order books in memory, enabling decentralized order matching at scale. This shift aims to increase security and transparency for traders while maintaining the performance of centralized exchanges.
articles.title: Decentralize Derivatives Trading with Custom Blockchain

articles.description: As crypto matures, accounting and tax regulations are evolving. Amy Kalnoki of Bitwave explains how her company helps crypto companies properly account for digital assets. She notes the importance of flexibility as new crypto assets emerge and regulations change. Stacy Elliott interviewed her at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Crypto Accounting Challenges and Opportunities

articles.description: Decrypt's Stacy Elliott sat down with Ledger CEO Pascal Gauthier to discuss crypto custody post-FTX, and the hardware wallet manufacturer's controversial Ledger Recover service.
articles.title: Most Crypto Users Don't Trust Themselves to Keep Their Seed Phrase Safe: Ledger CEO

articles.description: As India figures out its regulatory approach to the crypto industry, one thing is clear to Shardeum co-founder Nischal Shetty: “If you're a high-frequency trader, you can't afford to lose a percentage every time you sell,” he told Decrypt's Andre Beganski at Messari Mainnet in New York. “That's something that's caused a lot of issues.”
articles.title: India's 1% Crypto Tax Has Been a Nightmare for High-Frequency Traders, Says Shardeum CEO

articles.description: Solana has improved network reliability through upgrades like Quick and local fee markets. It recently partnered with Visa to allow settling transactions in USDC on Solana. This could enable merchants to receive instant payments and save on credit card processing fees. Stacy Elliott spoke with Austin Federa, Head of Strategy for the Solana Foundation, at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Newly Partnered with Visa, Solana Focuses on Reliability

articles.description: Decrypt's Stacy Elliott sat down with Robinhood Crypto general manager Johann Kerbrat at Messari Mainnet 2023, to talk about the trading platform's crypto wallet, onboarding new users through simplicity, and keeping platform fees sustainable.
articles.title: We Need to Start Thinking About How we Make Crypto Easy to Use: Robinhood Crypto General Manager

articles.description: Rich Rines, original Core DAO contributor and former Coinbase engineer, discusses how the narrative around Bitcoin is shifting in 2023. While Bitcoin remains digital gold, new layer 2 solutions are emerging to unlock more utility and value from the huge amounts of capital stored in Bitcoin. He says these innovations can benefit Bitcoin holders while keeping Bitcoin maximalists happy by building outside the base layer. André Beganski interviewed him at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Bitcoin's Narrative Is Shifting Towards Layer-2 Solutions

articles.description: Dave Weisberger, Co-Founder and CEO of CoinRoutes, argued that excessive regulation in the U.S. threatens to undermine the country's long-standing dominance in global financial markets. He warned that other countries are embracing blockchain and crypto to build more efficient digital markets, which could cause the US to lose its competitive edge and trillions in GDP. Weisberger said CoinRoutes is now focusing more on expanding internationally due to restrictive policies in the U.S. He was interviewed by André Beganski of Decrypt at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Regulation Threatens U.S. Dominance of Financial Markets, Says CoinRoutes CEO

articles.description: Paul Brody drives Ernst & Young (EY) initiatives and investments in blockchain technology across consulting, audit, and tax business lines. He says enterprise blockchain adoption is nearing an inflection point. Brody believes blockchains will one day handle 40 billion transactions daily across industries like automotive and pharma. Stacy Elliott interviewed him at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Explosive Growth Ahead for Enterprise Blockchain
